title: "L'Aquilone du Estrellas (The Kite of Stars)" by Dean Francis Alfar
description:
A young woman sets out on a quest to find all of the impossible materials needed to build a kite that can carry her to the stars.



This episode is sponsored by Penguin Random House (www.penguinrandomhouse.com/levar), Calm (www.calm.com/LEVAR), and Betterhelp (www.betterhelp.com/levar code: LEVAR).
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
